means: 经检验证明无病的，经检验证明无菌的
证明( attest的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: His beautifully illustrated book well attested his love of the university.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那本带有精美插图的书见证了他对大学的热爱。

sentence.Network_en: The handwriting expert attested to the genuineness of the signature.
sentence.Network_cn: 笔迹专家作证该签名无讹.
几名证人都证实了他的陈述是真实的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...ATN (augmented transition network) 扩充转移网络attested 经证实的attribute 属性
Such illness must be attested to by a medical certificate ., 患病应当提供医生的诊断证明.
The man ' s ability was attested by his rapid promotion ., 这个人的能力由他迅速的升迁获得见证.
This word is not attested until 1993 ., 这句话直到 1993年才得到证明.

list.abs: IBM公司 - 淘课百科 ... attestation 验证，验证书 attest function 查证职能，验证职能 attestation standard c 查证准则，验证准则.
attest 作证attestation clause 确认有效条款attestation 认证
consular agent 代理领事consular attestation 领事签证consular authority 领事职权
attestation 证言attesting witness 合同见证人attestment 证词

entry.tran: 说明，表示，证明（某事属实）
entry.def: To attest something or attest to something means to say, show, or prove that it is true.

example.ex: Police records attest to his long history of violence...
example.tran: 警方记录证明他有长期从事暴力活动的前科。

example.ex: I can personally attest that the cold and flu season is here...
example.tran: 感冒和流感季节来了，对此我有切身体会。

auth_sentence.content: Witness after witness attested to the department's self-scrutiny.
auth_sentence.res_content: Witness after witness attested to the department's self-scrutiny.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Witness after witness attested to the department's self-scrutiny.

auth_sentence.content: They attested to his mischievous vitality and his self-possession.
auth_sentence.res_content: They attested to his mischievous vitality and his self-possession.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They attested to his mischievous vitality and his self-possession.

auth_sentence.content: It seems impossible to refer all these well-attested stories to imposition.
auth_sentence.res_content: It seems impossible to refer all these well-attested stories to imposition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It seems impossible to refer all these well-attested stories to imposition.
